name: Talkable, Inc.
description: Developer of a referral program software intended to help brands acquire new customers with endorsements from current customers. The company's software identifies, targets, and rewards valuable customers through in-depth data analysis and offers A/B testing and ongoing campaign optimization, enabling users to create and optimize offers with pre-defined templates and to increase sales.
